actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-54, by Mr. Goss.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 19.
Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 155, H. Res. 130 is laid on the table.

official_title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

summary.text: Waives the requirement under rule XIII of the House of Representatives of a two-thirds vote to consider a Committee on Rules report on the same day it is presented to the House, with respect to any resolution reported by such Committee on May 3, 2001, providing for consideration or disposition of a conference report on H.Con. Res. 83 (congressional budget).

titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.
